node.title: 9. Stay In the Fire
node.description:
We are told that trials are essential! We are told that if we donÕt learn the first time around, we will be given the trial againÑand againÑuntil we finally learn the lesson. In this session we learn that trials are blessings sent in disguised packaging.

 

For PDF series guide, click here: 

http://www.path2prayer.com/article/1192/revival-and-holy-spirit/books-sermons/new-resources/discipleheart#RevivalNowBentonHarbor
